speak;; Gravesoll Port, a town filled with skilled sailors and markets with peculiar goods,{w} bustles with life both day and night.{w} Travelers entering the port can smell the ocean on the breeze,{w} hear the laughter of the children,{w} and partake in the music festivals being held.;;;hint
speak;; Though, in these turbulent and unstable times,{w} how long can this little corner of jubilance survive...?;;;hint

speak;Caroline; Up here should be the port town of Gravesoll.{w} I've never been myself,{w} but I've heard tell of their markets and festivals.
speak;Emma; After days of fighting and running, that would be beyond amazing.
bop_portrait;Emma
expression;Emma;Smile
speak;Emma; I'm in the perfect mood to eat and dance all day!
speak;Sarah; Just a reminder that we're here to meet Kate and the Dawn Brigade.{w} The celebrations can happen after convincing her to join us.
expression;Emma;NoSmile
speak;Caroline; Trust me, I haven't forgotten.{w} I would like to show my daughter the beauty and joy out in the world, though.
speak;Sarah; It's a commendable endeavor,{w} though your timing leaves something to be desired{tgm}...
speak;Caroline; Maybe, but when your home burns down,{w} you have to make some sudden and unexpected choices.{w} Perhaps you shouldn't make judgements on things you don't fully understand.
speak;Sarah; I-I'm sorry, I didn't mean to-
speak;Emma; How about we all calm down?{w} Mom, I'm sure Sarah didn't mean anything negative from her comment.{w} We're all just a little tense after having to leave our homes behind.
speak;Sarah; Yes, maybe I was a little{tgm}...{tgm} insensitive in my jest.
speak;Emma; Don't worry, we're all a team now.{w} We've got to stick together!
speak;Sarah; Right{tgm}...
speak;Sarah; It seems I was right about you.{w} You're already looking to be a better leader than I am now.
speak;Emma; Oh please, Sarah, don't be{tgm}...
speak;Emma; Wait{tgm}...{tgm}{w}{c:bop_portrait;Emma}is that smoke in the sky?
bop_portrait;Caroline
speak;Caroline; I see flames at the port town!{w} Everyone, get down while we move in!{w} We don't want whoever is attacking to notice us!
multi_remove_portrait;Caroline;Emma;Sarah
